song.title: Fall Afresh
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .G C
[V] .G C G C Awaken my soul, come awake . G C Em To hunger, to seek, to thirst .G C G C Awaken first love, come awake . G C Em And do as You did at first
[C] .G C G D Em Spirit of the Living God come fall afresh on me . C G D/F# Come awake me from my sleep .G C G Blow through the caverns of my soul . D Em C G D G Pour in me to overflow
[B] .Em G Come and fill this place . Em G Let Your glory now invade . C Em Spirit come and fill this place . C Dsus D D2 D Let Your glory now invade
